about_the_game:
A mysterious disease is turning people into vicious abominations. As part of Plague Birds Guild you are selected as the new field contractor and forced to abandon your research. You'll have to figure out why you've been picked for this role while surviving your new job of exterminating infected patients.

FEATURES:
- Dark Gothic Aesthetic
- Fast Paced Combat
- Immersive Soundscapes
- Analog Directional Attacks
- Plague Doctors
- Two "D" Rank Bosses
- Secret Hard Modes
- Upgrades
- Partial Controller Support
- Breakable Props
- Unimaginably Painful Medical Procedures
- Leeches

UPCOMING FEATURES:
- More Bosses
- More Characters
- More Weapons
- More Upgrades
- Weapon Upgrades
- More Secrets
- More Abilities
- Hard and Challenge Modes
- Full Controller Support
- More Areas
- Guild Overhaul and Expansion
- More Music
- Phobias
- Fixes and Adjustments to Art and Gameplay
- More Leeches!!!

name: Fowl Scourge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 or higher
  • Processor: Exists
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: In this Dark Fantasy Action-RPG you are part of a plague doctor guild where every encounter with your patients is a boss fight.
